CustomField.description:
Calculates a quote grade based on the number of quotes created and the number signed.
WHEN Quotes_Created >= 5 AND Quote_Signed_Percent < .31 THEN 'F' WHEN Quotes_Created = 4 AND Quote_Signed_Percent = 0 THEN 'F' WHEN Quotes_Created <= 2 AND Quote_Signed_Percent = 100 THEN 'B+' WHEN Quotes_Created <= 2 THEN 'INC' WHEN Quote_Signed_Percent >= .70 THEN 'A' WHEN Quote_Signed_Percent >= .50 THEN 'B' WHEN Quote_Signed_Percent >= .30 THEN 'C' ELSE 'D'
CustomField.label: Custom Quote Grade
